title: Shriram Transport Finance bets on construction equipment segment; expects 10% AUM growth in FY22 - CNBCTV18
content: Shriram Transport Finance bets on construction equipment segment; expects 10% AUM growth in FY22  CNBCTV18
description: In an interview with CNBC-TV18, Umesh Revankar, Vice Chairman and Managing Director, Shriram Transport Finance Company, said he sees a huge interest in construction equipment, in fact, he expects it to outperform other products. He expects assets under management (AUM) growth to be at 10 percent in FY22.
